Body:
async with ClientSession(base_url=b'http://localhost:8080', pools= pools_factory(responses)) as client: response = await client.get(b'/') assert response is not None assert response.status == 200 content = await response.text() assert content == expected_response_body pytest.mark.asynciopytest.mark.parametrize('responses,expected_response_body', get_scenarios( lambda status: [[Response(status, [(b'Location', b'/a')]), Response( status, [(b'Location', b'/b')]), Response(200, None, TextContent( 'Hello, World!'))], 'Hello, World!']) + get_scenarios(lambda status: [[ Response(status, [(b'Location', b'/a')]), Response(200, None, HtmlContent('

Hello, World!

'))], '

Hello, World!

']))
